name: Hanarenai
description:
Join together with the angel Hanare to get back her stolen Halo! 

Adventure is fun with friends, but how will she react when it's your time to leave?

This game was made within 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam

Programmer: SilverGold

Artists: Baph, Mafti and Zylla

Ost: Metaroom and Ben T
